$$.value: Brown Kitty
They are quiet and gentle in nature, so they don't go craving for food too often. They don't seem to be too obedient of their owners.
It was a cute little kitty, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...
Brown Puppy
They are outgoing and active in nature, so they can't sit still for a period of time, which makes them hungry often. They are very obedient of their owners.
It was a cute little puppy, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...
Pink Bunny
They are well-behaved and quiet, so they don't need to be fed more than the usual amount. They are smart and obedient, but also stubborn.
